description: There is **{seconds}** second left until Christmas!
There are **{seconds}** seconds left until Christmas!
title: {seconds} second left
{seconds} seconds left

added.description: {member} has been added to the naughty list.
added.title: тЬЕ Added

cannot_remove.description: {member} is not on the naughty list.
cannot_remove.title: тЭМ Can't remove member

removed.description: {member} has been removed from the naughty list.
removed.title: тЬЕ Removed

no_event.description: There are no secret santa events. Follow [the guide]({url}) to create one.
no_event.title: тЭМ Error

not_enough_users.description: Sorry, there weren't enough participants. At least 3 members need to join the event for Secret Santas to be assigned.
not_enough_users.title: ЁЯШж Not enough participants

none.description: You have not entered a Secret Santa event.
none.title: тЭМ Not assigned

show.description: **You are {member}'s Santa.** Give them a gift, following the event guidelines set by the organiser.
show.title: Secret Santa

channel_created.description: **The widget voice channel has been created.** To disable the widget, delete the channel.
channel_created.title: тЬЕ Countdown widget created

channel_permissions_error.description:
An error occurred whilst creating the channel.
[Try adding the bot again]({add}).
If it still doesn't work, [ask for help]({support}).
channel_permissions_error.title: тЭМ Can't create channel

missing_permission:channel.description: The bot does not have permission to manage channels.
missing_permission:channel.title: тЭМ Can't create channel

missing_permission:view.description: Please ensure the bot has permission to view the channel.
missing_permission:view.title: тЭМ Can't create webhook

missing_permission:webhook.description: The bot does not have permission to manage webhooks.
missing_permission:webhook.title: тЭМ Can't create webhook

webhook_created.description:
**The countdown has been enabled**; a message will be sent to {channel} every morning between 5AM and 6AM.

To disable it, use {toggle}.
webhook_created.title: тЬЕ Countdown webhook created

webhook_permissions_error.description:
An error occurred whilst creating the webhook.
[Try adding the bot again]({add}) and make sure it can see the countdown channel.
If it still doesn't work, [ask for help]({support}).
webhook_permissions_error.title: тЭМ Can't create webhook

sleeps.description: There {sleeps} or {days}[(?)]({url} "What's the difference between days and sleeps?") left until Christmas!
title: {sleeps} sleep left
{sleeps} sleeps left

description: There is {days}, {hours}, {minutes}, and {seconds} left until Christmas!
There are {days}, {hours}, {minutes}, and {seconds} left until Christmas!
total.title: {days}, {hours}, {minutes}, {seconds} left

weekday.description: Christmas Day is on a **{day}** in {year}.
weekday.title: Christmas is onтАж

description: There is **{weeks}** week left until Christmas!
There are **{weeks}** weeks left until Christmas!
title: {weeks} week left
{weeks} weeks left

disable.description:
**Server administrators: use {toggle} to disable the countdown (and {server} to enable/disable the countdown automatically next time).**
[Thank you for using this bot]({review}) and enjoy your Christmas! ЁЯЩВ
disable.title: ЁЯОД Merry Christmas

suggestion.label: Suggestion for Christmas Countdown
suggestion.placeholder: A suggestion for the Christmas Countdown bot, preferably in English.

santa_tracker.description: Santa is currently delivering presents over **[{city}, {region}]({map})**.
santa_tracker.ended:
Santa has finished delivering presents and is back in **{city}, {region}** for a rest.

[Please vote for the bot]({vote}) if you enjoyed this feature.
santa_tracker.starting: Santa is departing **{city}, {region}** to start delivering presents.
santa_tracker.title: Santa Tracker
